story.title: Monty's #MammothAdventure
story.description: A social media story where Monty, the cuddly toy mammoth available to buy in the Ice Age Art product range, visits UK destinations that have an Ice Age link. He then returns to the Museum in time for the Ice Age art family activities.

author.name: British Museum
author.bio: A museum of the world, for the world.

quote.text: Mammoths evolved in Africa and they spread across the world in the same way as humans #mammothadventure

quote.text: The British Museum's #mammothadventure makes me think I need a stuffed little field mascot to take photos of around the world.

user.name: Jacquelyn Gill

meta.text: The British Museum's #mammothadventure makes me think I need a stuffed little field mascot to take photos of around the world.

quote.text: @britishmuseum If you are passing thru Shropshire Monty Mammoth watch out for those kettle holes - they proved fatal for our three Mammoths!
